topic.title: So...... can i get a FUD (Full Undetectable) Trojan anywhere?
topic.body:
It's been a while since i've been playing with trojans and viruses, but recently a company executive stole some very important info from my company and i want to get it back. So... i thought of infecting him with a trojan to see what he's up to. Can i get any help here?
Just point me in the right direction, and you'll make me very happy :)

1587891915_184rhnxM89SU1gDuPEaQPjynfytkR.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_2084_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Reminds me of Warsow, but not twitchy, which is good.

True! Very simillar to Warsow.

1588692906_1CcmrTeqtuoQtUpuxBZ9wFZz1tPaB.body: Jeez. This is the moment where we should be trying to merge these technologies so we can create a world decentralized solution, so we can finally stop using privacy data theft, etc

1589201882_17v2UBGNSMncMni3XDXFAJa8HtwGu.body:
> [1bfqutudhtexlka](#comment_171_144CwRj8eynTUC9DtGHaNHR3wm9P2EhuAY): sleep early you have a school tomorrow

Nice. But believe it or not, i'm not that young. I just don't have the time to make one.

> [nesselon](#comment_14_15wHfknPYGm91ZDyofsrYnhHzW4zH6xpXU): No offense but if you don't know where to find what you're looking for and are short on time, this operation is probably a really bad idea that might backfire very fast. I suggest you contact a lawyer and press charges against the executive. [...]

Unfortunately i can't present evidence. But i thank you for your input.

> [ransbits](#comment_4_1H9xEgESUhfvpYK3SLLqabc1uLT2jsmH2A): Your comment reeks of ignorance on a magnitude of levels... [...]

I understand what i'm proposing here, no need for insults. And it's not even my idea. If i knew another way, i would resort to another solution.

> [tnytuqsgqnywmecj](#comment_18_19y1ZG2DVeRM65kYxKcLz7MLGTfTfoUWSm): Think you are looking for a root kit you can drop...    Try https://www.kali.org/downloads/   ...  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J36yzsCLPNg

Thanks for the tip. A Rootkit should suffice. ;)
